# title

**Instance Property**

The title for the poster view.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var title: String? { get set }
```

## Discussion

The title appears beneath the image in the poster view.

## Configuring a Poster View

- **image**: The image for the poster view.
- **imageView**: The image view associated with the poster view.
- **subtitle**: The subtitle for the poster view.
